Almost looked like we were going to get help for a second there but we were passed to another rep. Stay tuned for more on the Dell Drop!!
Dell Drop (con'd): Best engineering solution (parachute, foam padding, etc.) for protecting useless dell computers as they drop 100 feet.
Also, if we don't get our refund, prepare for the Dell Drop! Location in the bay area TBD, we will have a competition for best engineering
Dell Computer saga. Still no help. Moving into hour 31 with technical support/refund support/general smooth-talking-helpless line.
Don't worry it gets worse! Refunds: 0. Order numbers: 3. List of people we've spoken with at Dell who have helped us: 0. Ah, Dell Computers.
Even more Dell Computer travesty stats. Emails for help: 9. Emails returned: 0. Weeks since we first contacted them: 8. Service tags: 9.
More Dell Computers travesty stats: Money paid: $4,500. Computers working: 0. Cust Service reps spoken to: 25. Calls this morning: 6
The travesty of being a small business and trying to work with Dell Computers. Stats so far: 30 hours on hold
